entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
